Text: MAryville, thank you for all you do. As long as you're granting wishes, I'd like the Scary Godmother comics if you are anyone u know has them. I have them all except for a couple and they're very hard to hard to find. Thank you again in advance.

oskar5000, i looked for them at 7 or 8 sites and unfortunately, i can't find any of them.

so if you can, please share those that you do have!
TYVM anyway for your time and trouble  :)
you're welcome! i'll keep an eye out for those -- i'd like to have them myself!
Thanks for the 1.7 GBs of ALF!! I'll never read em, but I gotta have em. What else is the external HD I bought for, if not a crap load of ALF comics?
someday your hard drive with the ALF collection will be discovered by the grandchildren of your grandchildren and archived by the interplanetary library of 20th century marvels. LOL
i asked for this about 2 weeks  ago and you came thru, thank you so much, this has made my day and my kids are gonna flip out on these, you r the best

you're welcome. i'm glad to hear that. ALF holiday special 2 was one of the comics i bought with my allowance when i was 10 years old, so that's nice that you're passing on a love of reading!

and yeah, it just takes some time to get the whole set. the Marvel Chronology torrents are great, but downloading from them is slow at times.
lol. I can only hope that when they see them ALF will become their greatest role model in life, the way he became mine
